title: Take a page from smite
body: Smite is basically a more improved version of league. Same style of items champs builds only It's harder due to the third person view. So with that the god Serguet which is a snake alien looking creature . They should change skarner more how she works or Cass.  Passive next basic does more damage based on how many poisons you have on target . Q w and ult poison with different poisons while e is a leap

replies.body: The thing they should take away from SMITE is disabling all chat for matchmade games. There's no real reason to communicate with the enemy team in-game. If you want to say anything to the enemy, you can do it at the post game lobby.

When i read this thread....... And seeing your previous thread......

I just think of you with a smoke on a playground trying to pass it around saying "hey kids, come try this, its so awesome and will make you look cool."
